Posts.Title: 2cm rice shape lump 15 years after biopsy and lymph removal Piperdog Piperdog

Posts.Content: Piperdog wrote: Did not have bc but had tb in my lymph node so axillery ll were removed when I was 11 .. right under the scar is an oblong hard movable lump.. it' new had a previous lump lower to side of breast which turned out fine but this feels diff it's very hard long but oval/oblong when I bring my arm down I can hold it between my fingers its like a little rod like thing .. im 25 theres been some stabbing pain in that area ps its not lymph as none in that area only above and below.. not been poorly ECT but at the side of my scar aswell is a flat matted hard patch about 5 cm right at the side of this hard lump... I know I can' get diagnosis on here but worried about going to my Dr and sounding like a crazy woman ........Again ! Log in to post a reply
